#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    string a;
    while(cin >> a)
    {
        string arr = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ";
        int val = a.length();
        for(int x = 0; x < val; x++)
            cout << arr[int(a[x])-62];
            cout << endl;
 
    }
  return 0;
}
